channel.title: Alpine linux distro
channel.description:
did anyone tried alpinelinux ?
they claim:- "Small. Simple. Secure." how secure they r ?
do u think its a good idea to use it with whonix? if no, why ?
hope to c anyone who has any knowledge/trail with it.
their homepage website is:-
https://www.alpinelinux.org/
note*:- i have seen their forum its kinda dead , there r no many topics/comments in it nor replies. maybe because of its low publicity ?! maybe ...

item.title: Alpine linux distro
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
well yeah , its well true comment; and the choice of switching to debian was also succeeded one. i think one day and soon enough we will have our own distro, a distro just focus on anonymity not anything else.

Read full topic
